RTSP (RTSPU RTSPT): <ref group="protocolnotes">Only WMA files are playable by foobar2000 through an RTSP connection. RealMedia  AAC  etc. are not supported.</ref>
Podcasting: <ref group="protocolnotes">3rd party plugin for 0.9 allows reading RSS 2.0 feeds as playlists. No subscription/automatic update features.</ref>
<ref group="protocolnotes">Present in version 3.0 currently going through Alpha Testing.</ref>
<ref group="protocolnotes">As of 0.9.2 it allows reading RSS as podcast source. Issues if links in RSS do not point directly to playable media. Automatic update of podcasts available.</ref>
